Articles.Content:
howdy all ..another new recruit signed on into service. Ive been off and on playing around with KSP for about 3 months.. and finally gotten hold of enough time to actually have a good sit down and dive a bit deeper into it. I have one thing to say after browsing thru these forums... this place looks like home ;o) alot of friendly and knowledgeable people here and i think ill be sticking around a bit.

ok thats more than just one thing to say.. but just for the record... I'm happy to be here!

now lets fling some lil green dudes into the far reaches of space....
WELLCOME! and good luck making jeb sick...... that takes a lot.

Welcome may you have many soft landings in the future.

From another newbie just starting out.

"now lets fling some lil green dudes into the far reaches of space...." That might take a while haha, the "far reaches of space" is a LOOOOOOONNNNGGG way out there! I hope you enjoy it here! Feel free to ask questions and make sure to read the rules

Welcome cadet! Enjoy your stay- There's always knowledge about KSP on the forum. Come to think about it, you haven't seen the kraken drive! These new guys will be the first of the age! Go check it out, in general discussion "Kraken Drive, K-Drive" Something like that!
